title: Tensei Maou no Juliet - Novel Updates

tags: Academy   Beautiful Female Lead   Clingy Lover   Couple Growth   Curses   Determined Protagonist   Different Social Status   Elemental Magic   Kingdoms   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mismatched Couple   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty   Soul Power   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic

description:
“If I connect with her, the world will perish. Nevertheless, I like her –”

Haruto, a magician of commoner origin from the magic academy, was confessed to by the hostile country princess, Iris, and they decided to go out!? 

However, she carries half the body of the Demon King, and when she is tied together with Haruto, they’ll be an existence that will bring the world to ruin

“Those shackles, and curse, I’ll destroy and shatter it for her sake!”>
